label: i-pãm=nda ne=n t<h>o s-ujarẽ-n=nda ne=wa khu-mba
trs: My father narrated this way and I used to hear it thus.

label: ne=nhy khátpy=ra ne=n mẽ=thõj pĩ=n khu-thu=n t<h>o mo=nhy akhum kh-wê thẽ
trs: It was so, and so the khátpy monster wounded one of our people unconscious, loaded him on his back and took him far away, and he (the forefather) ran away from him.
